column2: System Workflow Tests - Enhanced with Front-end Analysis
Test all possible scenarios for main workflows of Condotel Management system end-to-end, including Front-end UI interactions, Back-end API calls, and complete user flows

column4: Pending
column5: N/A

column4: Test Case Procedure
column5: Expected Results
column6: Pre-conditions

column1: Scenario A: Booking Workflow - Enhanced (25 test cases)

column4:
1. Open browser and navigate to application URL
2. Navigate to "Danh sách Condotel" or "Listing Stay" page (/listing-stay)
3. View condotel list page
column5:
1. System displays list of condotels with images, names, prices
2. Each condotel card shows: image, name, price per night, location, rating
3. User can scroll through the list
4. Pagination or infinite scroll works correctly
column6: Application is running. Condotels exist in database

column4:
1. Navigate to "Listing Stay" page
2. Click on "Bộ lọc" or "Filter" button
3. Set minimum price: 200000 VND
4. Set maximum price: 1000000 VND
5. Click "Áp dụng" or "Apply" button
column5:
1. System displays only condotels within price range
2. Filter is applied correctly
3. Condotel list updates to show filtered results
column6: Condotels with different prices exist in database

column4:
1. Navigate to "Listing Stay" page
2. Click on "Bộ lọc" button
3. Select location from dropdown (e.g., "Hà Nội")
4. Click "Áp dụng" button
column5:
1. System displays only condotels in selected location
2. Filter is applied correctly
3. Location filter works as expected
column6: Condotels in different locations exist in database

column4:
1. Navigate to "Listing Stay" page
2. Enter condotel name in search box (e.g., "Luxury Apartment")
3. Press Enter or click search icon
column5:
1. System displays condotels matching search term
2. Search results are relevant
3. Search is case-insensitive
column6: Condotels with different names exist in database

column4:
1. Navigate to "Listing Stay" page
2. Click on a condotel card
3. View condotel detail page (/listing-stay-detail/:id)
column5:
1. System displays complete condotel information:
   - Images gallery
   - Name, description
   - Price per night
   - Location, address
   - Amenities list
   - Reviews and ratings
   - Host information
2. Date picker is available
3. "Đặt phòng" button is visible
column6: Condotel exists in database with complete information

column4:
1. Complete booking flow to checkout page (/checkout)
2. View checkout page with booking details
column5:
1. System displays booking summary:
   - Condotel name and image
   - Check-in and check-out dates
   - Number of nights
   - Price per night
   - Subtotal
   - Service fees (if any)
   - Total price
2. Promotion section is visible (if available)
3. Voucher input field is visible
4. Service packages section is visible (if available)
5. Reward points option is visible
column6: User is logged in as Tenant. Booking data is passed to checkout page

column4:
1. Navigate to checkout page with booking data
2. Enter valid voucher code in "Mã voucher" input field
3. Click "Áp dụng" or "Apply" button
4. Verify voucher is applied
column5:
1. System validates voucher code
2. Voucher discount is applied to total price
3. System displays message: "Voucher đã được áp dụng"
4. Total price is recalculated with discount
5. Discount amount is shown separately
column6: Valid voucher exists in database. Voucher is active and not expired

column4:
1. Navigate to checkout page
2. Enter invalid voucher code (e.g., "INVALID123")
3. Click "Áp dụng" button
column5:
1. System displays error message: "Mã voucher không hợp lệ" or "Voucher không tồn tại"
2. Voucher discount is not applied
3. Total price remains unchanged
column6: User is on checkout page

column4:
1. Navigate to checkout page
2. View "Gói dịch vụ" or "Service Packages" section
3. Select service package from list
4. Set quantity for selected package
5. Review updated total price
column5:
1. System displays available service packages
2. User can select packages and set quantity
3. Total price is updated to include service package costs
4. Service package details are shown (name, price, quantity)
5. Updated total is calculated correctly
column6: Service packages exist in database. User is on checkout page

column4:
1. Navigate to checkout page
2. View "Điểm thưởng" or "Reward Points" section
3. Check "Sử dụng điểm thưởng" checkbox
4. Verify points are applied to discount
column5:
1. System shows available reward points
2. User can toggle "Use reward points" option
3. Points are converted to discount amount
4. Total price is reduced by discount amount
5. Remaining points balance is shown
column6: User has reward points in account. User is on checkout page

column1: Scenario B: Payment Workflow - Enhanced (15 test cases)

column4:
1. Complete booking creation
2. Navigate to payment page (/pay-done) or payment link is displayed
3. View payment information
column5:
1. System displays payment link or QR code
2. Payment amount is shown correctly
3. Order code is displayed
4. User can copy payment link
5. "Thanh toán ngay" button redirects to PayOS
column6: Booking is created. Payment link is generated

column4:
1. Navigate to payment page
2. View QR code section
column5:
1. QR code is displayed clearly
2. QR code is scannable
3. QR code contains payment information
4. User can download or print QR code
column6: Payment link is generated. QR code is available

column3: Payment Success Page - After Successful Payment
column4:
1. Complete payment on PayOS
2. PayOS redirects to payment success page (/payment/success)
3. View success page
column5:
1. System displays success message: "Thanh toán thành công"
2. Booking confirmation is shown
3. Booking ID is displayed
4. Booking status is updated to "Đã xác nhận"
5. User can navigate to booking history
column6: Payment is completed successfully on PayOS

column3: Payment Cancel Page - After Cancelled Payment
column4:
1. Cancel payment on PayOS
2. PayOS redirects to payment cancel page (/payment/cancel)
3. View cancel page
column5:
1. System displays message: "Thanh toán đã bị hủy"
2. Booking status remains "Chờ thanh toán"
3. User can retry payment
4. Link to booking detail is provided
column6: User cancels payment on PayOS page

column3: Check Payment Status - From Booking History
column4:
1. Navigate to "Lịch sử đặt phòng" or "Booking History" page
2. Click on a pending booking
3. View booking detail page
4. Click "Kiểm tra trạng thái thanh toán" button
column5:
1. System displays payment status information
2. Shows: status (Pending/Paid/Cancelled), amount, orderCode, payment date
3. Status is updated in real-time
4. User can see payment history
column6: Booking with payment link exists. User is logged in

column1: Scenario C: Refund Workflow - Enhanced (18 test cases)

column3: Request Refund Page - View Booking Information
column4:
1. Navigate to "Lịch sử đặt phòng" page
2. Click on a confirmed or cancelled booking
3. Click "Yêu cầu hoàn tiền" button
4. Navigate to refund request page (/request-refund/:id)
column5:
1. System displays booking information:
   - Booking ID
   - Condotel name
   - Check-in and check-out dates
   - Total price
   - Booking status
2. Refund amount is calculated and displayed
3. Bank information form is visible
column6: Booking exists and is eligible for refund. User is logged in as Tenant

column3: Request Refund Page - Fill Bank Information
column4:
1. Navigate to refund request page
2. Select bank from dropdown (e.g., "Vietcombank - VCB")
3. Enter account number: 1234567890
4. Enter account holder name: [Tenant name]
5. Review form before submitting
column5:
1. Bank dropdown shows list of Vietnamese banks
2. All fields are filled correctly
3. Form validation works (required fields)
4. Account number format is validated
5. Account holder name is validated
column6: User is on refund request page. Booking is eligible for refund

column3: Request Refund Page - Submit Without Bank Info
column4:
1. Navigate to refund request page
2. Leave bank information fields empty
3. Click "Gửi yêu cầu hoàn tiền" button
column5:
1. System uses bank info from Wallet (if available)
2. Or system displays message prompting for bank info
3. Refund request is created with wallet bank info
4. Confirmation message is shown
column6: User has wallet with bank information. Booking is eligible for refund

column4:
1. Navigate to "Chính sách hoàn tiền" or "Refund Policy" page (/refund-policy)
2. View refund policy content
column5:
1. System displays refund policy information
2. Policy includes: conditions, timeframes, process, contact information
3. Policy is clearly formatted and readable
4. User can navigate back to previous page
column6: Refund policy page exists

column1: Scenario D: Review Workflow - Enhanced (12 test cases)

column3: Write Review Page - View Booking Information
column4:
1. Navigate to "Lịch sử đặt phòng" page
2. Click on a completed booking
3. Click "Viết đánh giá" button
4. Navigate to write review page (/write-review/:id)
column5:
1. System displays booking information:
   - Booking ID
   - Condotel name and image
   - Check-in and check-out dates
   - Booking dates
2. Review form is visible with:
   - Star rating selector (1-5 stars)
   - Title input field
   - Comment textarea
3. Submit button is available
column6: Booking exists with status "Completed". User is logged in as Tenant

column4:
1. Navigate to write review page
2. Click on star rating (e.g., click 5th star for 5-star rating)
3. Verify rating is selected
column5:
1. Selected stars are highlighted (yellow/gold color)
2. Unselected stars are gray
3. Rating value is stored (1-5)
4. User can change rating by clicking different star
5. Rating is visually clear
column6: User is on write review page

column3: Write Review Page - Fill Review Form
column4:
1. Navigate to write review page
2. Select rating: 5 stars
3. Enter title: "Trải nghiệm tuyệt vời"
4. Enter comment: "Căn hộ rất đẹp và tiện nghi..."
5. Review form before submitting
column5:
1. All fields are filled correctly
2. Title and comment are saved in form state
3. Form validation works (rating is required)
4. Character count is shown (if applicable)
5. Submit button is enabled
column6: User is on write review page

column3: My Reviews Page - View Reviews List
column4:
1. Navigate to "Đánh giá của tôi" or "My Reviews" page (/my-reviews)
2. View reviews list
column5:
1. System displays list of all reviews created by user
2. Each review shows:
   - Condotel name and image
   - Rating (stars)
   - Title and comment
   - Date created
   - Edit/Delete buttons (if within 7 days)
3. Reviews are ordered by date (newest first)
4. Only non-deleted reviews are shown
column6: User has created multiple reviews. User is logged in as Tenant

column4:
1. Navigate to "My Reviews" page
2. Click "Chỉnh sửa" button on a review (created < 7 days ago)
3. Update rating and comment
4. Click "Lưu thay đổi" button
column5:
1. Review form opens with existing data
2. User can update rating and comment
3. Changes are saved successfully
4. Updated review is displayed
5. Updated timestamp is shown
column6: Review exists and was created < 7 days ago. User is logged in

column3: My Reviews Page - Edit Review After 7 Days
column4:
1. Navigate to "My Reviews" page
2. Try to click "Chỉnh sửa" button on a review (created > 7 days ago)
column5:
1. "Chỉnh sửa" button is disabled or not shown
2. System displays message: "Bạn chỉ có thể chỉnh sửa review trong vòng 7 ngày"
3. Review cannot be edited
column6: Review exists and was created > 7 days ago. User is logged in

column1: Scenario E: Host Management - Enhanced (10 test cases)

column4:
1. Login the system with Host role
2. Navigate to "Host Dashboard" page (/host-dashboard)
3. View "Condotels" tab (default tab)
column5:
1. System displays list of host's condotels
2. Each condotel shows: name, image, status, price, number of bookings
3. "Thêm Condotel mới" button is visible
4. "Chỉnh sửa" and "Xóa" buttons are available for each condotel
5. User can click on condotel to view details
column6: User is logged in as Host role. Host has condotels in database

column4:
1. Navigate to Host Dashboard
2. Click on "Bookings" tab
3. View bookings list
column5:
1. System displays list of bookings for host's condotels
2. Each booking shows: booking ID, condotel name, customer name, dates, status, total price
3. Host can update booking status (Pending → Confirmed → Completed)
4. Status update buttons are available
5. Bookings are filtered by host's condotels
column6: User is logged in as Host role. Bookings exist for host's condotels

column3: Host Dashboard - View Service Package Tab
column4:
1. Navigate to Host Dashboard
2. Click on "Gói dịch vụ" or "Service Package" tab
3. View service package information
column5:
1. System displays current active package (if any)
2. Shows: package name, status, start date, end date, condotel limit
3. Shows current condotel count vs limit
4. "Mua gói mới" button is visible (if no package or package expired)
5. Package details are clearly displayed
column6: User is logged in as Host role

column4:
1. Navigate to Host Dashboard
2. Click "Thêm Condotel mới" button
3. Navigate to add condotel page (/add-condotel)
4. Fill condotel form:
   - Enter name: "Luxury Apartment"
   - Enter description: "Beautiful apartment..."
   - Select resort
   - Enter price per night: 500000
   - Enter beds: 2
   - Enter bathrooms: 1
   - Select amenities
   - Upload images
column5:
1. All form fields are available and functional
2. Form validation works (required fields)
3. Image upload works correctly
4. Amenities selection works
5. Form can be saved as draft or submitted
column6: User is logged in as Host role. Host has active service package

column4:
1. Navigate to add condotel page
2. Host has reached condotel limit (e.g., 3/3)
3. Try to create new condotel
4. Fill form and click "Tạo" button
column5:
1. System displays error message: "Bạn đã đạt đến số lượng condotel tối đa"
2. Condotel cannot be created
3. User is advised to upgrade package
4. Link to package purchase page is shown
column6: Host has reached condotel limit. User is logged in as Host

column1: Scenario F: Admin Management - Enhanced (5 test cases)

column3: Admin Refund Page - View Refund Requests
column4:
1. Login the system with Admin role
2. Navigate to "Quản lý hoàn tiền" or "Refund Management" page (/admin/refunds)
3. View refund requests list
column5:
1. System displays list of all refund requests
2. Each request shows: booking ID, customer name, amount, status, date, bank info
3. Filter options are available (by status: All, Pending, Completed, Rejected)
4. Search functionality works
5. "Xác nhận hoàn tiền" button is available for pending requests
column6: User is logged in as Admin role. Refund requests exist in database

column3: Admin Refund Page - Filter by Status
column4:
1. Navigate to Admin Refund page
2. Click on filter dropdown
3. Select "Đang chờ" or "Pending" status
4. Click "Lọc" button
column5:
1. System displays only pending refund requests
2. Other status requests are hidden
3. Filter is applied correctly
4. Filter count is updated
5. User can clear filter to show all
column6: Refund requests with different statuses exist. User is logged in as Admin

column3: Admin Payout Page - View Pending Payouts
column4:
1. Navigate to "Quản lý thanh toán Host" or "Payout Management" page (/admin/payouts)
2. View "Chờ thanh toán" or "Pending Payouts" tab
3. View pending payouts list
column5:
1. System displays list of pending payouts
2. Each payout shows: booking ID, condotel name, host name, amount, end date, days since completed
3. "Xác nhận thanh toán" button is available for each payout
4. "Xử lý tất cả" button is available
5. Payouts are filtered correctly (>= 15 days, no refund request)
column6: User is logged in as Admin role. Completed bookings >= 15 days ago exist

column3: Admin Payout Page - Process Single Payout
column4:
1. Navigate to Admin Payout page
2. Click on a pending payout from list
3. View payout detail page
4. Review payout information (booking, host, amount, bank info)
5. Click "Xác nhận thanh toán" button
6. Confirm action in popup dialog
column5:
1. System displays payout detail information
2. All information is correct (booking, host, amount, bank)
3. Confirmation dialog appears
4. After confirmation, payout is processed
5. System displays message: "Đã trả tiền thành công cho host"
6. Payout moves to "Đã thanh toán" section
column6: Pending payout exists. User is logged in as Admin. Host has wallet

column3: Admin Payout Page - Process All Payouts
column4:
1. Navigate to Admin Payout page
2. View pending payouts list
3. Click "Xử lý tất cả" or "Process All" button
4. Confirm action in popup dialog
column5:
1. System displays confirmation dialog with count of payouts to process
2. After confirmation, all eligible payouts are processed
3. System displays message: "Đã xử lý {count} booking và trả {amount} VNĐ"
4. All processed payouts move to "Đã thanh toán" section
5. ProcessedCount and TotalAmount are shown correctly
column6: Multiple pending payouts exist. User is logged in as Admin
